tool_description: Get online shopping deals, discounts and rewards from fashion to beauty, home furniture, clothing, shoes, electronics and more...
name: Kohls
title: Kohls

api_list.name: products/search-by-barcode
stores/list
api_list.description: List stores near a provided GEO location

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius to look for stores around the GEO location

api_list.name: qnas/list
api_list.description: List questions and answers relating to a product

required_parameters.name: ProductId
required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: categories/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kohls.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kohls.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kohls.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kohls.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/detail
api_list.description: Get detail information of specific product

required_parameters.name: webID
required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews relating to a product

required_parameters.name: ProductId
required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/list
api_list.description: List products with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: dimensionValueID
optional_parameters.description: The value of payload/dimensions/dimensionValues/currentDimensionId JSON object returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter several times to filter by multiple options. Ex : ...&dimensionValueID=AgeAppropriate:Teens&dimensionValueID=Size:TWIN...

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Any term or phrase to look for relating products. Ex : bikini top

optional_parameters.name: sortID
optional_parameters.description: The value of payload/sorts/ID JSON object returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.name: auto-complete (Deprecating)
api_list.description: Get suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with
